hackathon-description-text: You don't need us to tell you that VR is on fire right now. It's one of the fastest growing new technologies, and one that's been forecasted for decades. We don't have jetpacks and space travel yet, but we sure as hell can pretend that we do in VR.

hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Travel Reimbursements to Junction Main Event

hackathon-description-header: Come Bring Reality to Virtual Reality
